subject: re:Can't be a lover anymore?
body:
Dear valued member.
With this letter we are presenting you one of the most popular Canadian on-line drug stores. MyCanadianPharmacy is known for providing quality products at ultra low prices. 
Cheap pharmaceutical products of high quality. Even cheaper now as MyCanadianPharmacy announced special Spring discounts.
Click here and see a wide range of products to choose fromhttp://makesame.hk
Easy and secure ordering process.All your personal information will remain private and confidential.The highest quality customer service. Fast and safe delivery. 
Best regards,Jennifer Sresthadatta
